summary: The brothers, Andy & Terry Bogard, along with Joe Higashi and Mai Shiranui, try to help Sulia Gaudeamus stop her ambitious brother Laocorn from finding the magical armor of Mars.
cast: Mark Hildreth|Peter Wilds|Jason Gray-Stanford|Lisa Ann Beley|Matt Hill|Myriam Sirois|Janyse Jaud|Paul Dobson|John Payne|French Tickner|David Kaye|Robert O. Smith|Ward Perry|Willow Johnson|Chafûrin|Reiko Chiba|Show Hayami|Nobuyuki Hiyama|Kikuko Inoue|Yô Inoue|Trish Ledoux|Shin'ichirô Miki|Kotono Mitsuishi|Daiki Nakamura|Keiichi Nanba|Kazukiyo Nishikiori|Tomo Sakurai|Hidekatsu Shibata|Kôji Totani|Kenji Utsumi|Jôji Yanami
title: Fatal Fury: La Película
